001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
009import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
012import com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar;
013import com.squareup.picasso.Callback;
014import com.squareup.picasso.Picasso;
015import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.databinding.FragmentImageBinding;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.ApodViewModel;
020import javax.inject.Inject;
021
022@AndroidEntryPoint
023public class ImageFragment extends Fragment {
024
025  private static final String TAG = ImageFragment.class.getSimpleName();
026
027  @Inject
028  Picasso picasso;
029
030  private FragmentImageBinding binding;
031
032
033  @Nullable
034  @Override
035  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
036      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
037    binding = FragmentImageBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
038    return binding.getRoot();
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
043    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
044    ApodViewModel viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity())
045        .get(ApodViewModel.class);
046    viewModel
047        .getApod()
048        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), this::handleApod);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public void onDestroyView() {
053    binding = null;
054    super.onDestroyView();
055  }
056
057  private void handleApod(Apod apod) {
058    String title = apod
059        .getTitle()
060        .strip();
061    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
062    ((AppCompatActivity) requireActivity())
063        .getSupportActionBar()
064        .setTitle(title);
065    binding.image.setTooltipText(title);
066    binding.image.setContentDescription(title);
067    picasso
068        .load(apod.getLowDefUrl().toString())
069        .into(binding.image, new ImageCallback());
070  }
071
072  private class ImageCallback implements Callback {
073
074    @Override
075    public void onSuccess() {
076      binding.loadingIndicator.setVisibility(View.GONE);
077
078    }
079
080    //this will return an instance of snackbar, this isn't a static method
081    //give it a view that Snackbar will attach to = binding.getRoot
082    //extract to string resource = image_error_message
083    @Override
084    public void onError(Exception e) {
085      Snackbar.make(binding.getRoot(), R.string.image_error_message,
086              Snackbar.LENGTH_LONG) //the value of this expression is reference
087          .show();
088    }
089  }
090
091
092}
